Course.name: Game Master - Cyber Bullet
Course.description:
This course demonstrates a collective (team) assessment on a convoy operation tasked with securing a weapons cache.  Along the way a cyber attack compromises the team's GPS (shown by flashing arrows in VBS) and they must decide whether to trust the GPS or follow directions from an embedded interpreter (which should be one of the learners in the course).


Concepts: vehicle convoy (speed, spacing, situational awareness), cyber (compromised GPS), ambush, secure weapons cache

Number of users: 2 to 8

Intended Audience: everyone

Training Applications:

  • VBS

Peripherals: none

message.content:
Cyber Bullet - NoDie 

Our intel suggests that there is an ENY weapons cache in the surrounding area. You have been tasked to take a convoy to collect the weapons from an abandoned building on the outskirts of town.

You will take a squad sized element, along with your interpreter, on the mission to collect the weapons and return to the FOB WARRIOR. Once you arrive at the weapons cache you will alert to higher and secure the site, the mission will be complete.

As a result of faulty Blue Force Tracker equipment, you are relying on your civilian GPS from a cell phone to maneuver to the weapons cache. Your GPS is represented as blue arrows in the simulation. The enemy has cyber capabilities and access to IDF.  

Click the arrow to continue when you are ready.
You have successfully completed the Cyber Bullet training.
